name: Jersey Fist-Pump Free: Beat the Beat-Up!
name_original: Jersey Fist-Pump Free: Beat the Beat-Up!
description:
Fistpump your iPhone to beat the beat up!


*10+ Background beats (3 in Free version) including:
.C-Side Creepin'
.AC Shuffle
.Jazzy Jersey
.Sweeto & Sweetette
...and Many More!

*10+ Fist Pump sounds (4 in Free version) including:
.Bass Bump
.Grenades & Landmines
.Hippo-phant
.Fart Sounds
."Beat It!"
...and Many More!

*Ability to "Start off Low" to build the beat up
